sentences.en: AGENT Good morning. MIC House Agency.
sentences.cn: 早上好. MIC房屋代理处.

sentences.en: But positioning the mic is not enough: It has to be stable.
sentences.cn: 但麦克光定位是远远不够的: 还要绝对牢靠.

sentences.en: I just get on the mic and spit it.
sentences.cn: 我不过是对着麦克风然后直接吐出来罢了.

sentences.en: I learned to unify the pen and pad with the mic.
sentences.cn: 尽管我学会了拿我的纸笔和麦克风沟通.

sentences.en: I sat down in the dark hall with 600 other nervous kids and the lecturer booms out over the mic, “How do you get workers to work harder?
sentences.cn: 我和其他600个紧张的孩子坐在暗暗的大厅，演讲者透过麦克风发出低沉的声音：“如何使员工们工作更努力？”

sentences.en: Medical informed Consent ( MIC ) is a new rule in health care practice.
sentences.cn: 医疗知情同意书是医疗法律文书,是卫生部《 病历 书写基本规范》的新要求.

sentences.en: Methods: The susceptibility testing of organisms challenged was checked by disc diffusion test and MIC.
sentences.cn: 方法药物感性试验采用纸片扩散法和MIC法.

sentences.en: MIC input not clipped when loud voice in VoIP call.
sentences.cn: 当在使用IP电话中大声通话时麦克风音频输入不会中断.

sentences.en: My favorite condenser for snare is the Sony 37 A tube condenser mic.
sentences.cn: 我录军鼓最喜欢用的电容麦是SONY37A管子麦.

sentences.en: On the contrary , MIC of SE 7 , SE 9 and SE 68 increased after adding of reserpine.
sentences.cn: 但菌株SE7、SE9、SE68的MIC在加入利舍平后增大.

sentences.en: Position the mic stand on the floor near the hi - hat mic stand.
sentences.cn: 把麦克架架在踩镲麦架附近的地板上.

sentences.en: Results Not all of the decoctions are of the same MIC.
sentences.cn: 结果各配伍煎液的MIC不全相同.

sentences.en: Some people use the Neumann 47 FET ( condenser ) mic.
The MIC of berberiae was obviously lower than that of acidum salicylicum.
sentences.cn: 同时发现该药的MIC明显低于水杨酸.

sentences.en: The mic of the phone is used as a sort of an open mic in a room that detects voices of all the speakers, identifies them and infers their emotions.
sentences.cn: 在空间上，手机的麦克风是用来作为一个开放的麦克风，所有的扬声器声音检测，识别和推断出他们自己的情绪。

sentences.en: The minimum inhibitory concentration ( MIC ) of herbs to the bacteria been tested.
sentences.cn: 采用肉汤稀释法,测定中药对测试菌的最低抑菌浓度 ( MIC ).

sentences.en: The sensitiyity to 5 - FC , AMB, NYS, MIC , KET and ECO was 52 %, 48 %, 64 % , 16 % 、16 % 、16 % separately.
sentences.cn: 菌株对 5-FC 、 AMB 、 NYS 、 MIC、KET、ECO6种药物的敏感性分别为52% 、 48% 、 64%、16%、16%、16%.
